metadata.description: Nothing about Donarudo passes the eyeball test when it comes to politicians, from his uneven tan to his bald-- er, unusual hairstyle to his unimpressive physique.  However, whatever else he lacks, he's got it big when it comes to problems: He just can't seem to find an opponent strong enough to take on!  He's so powerful that he can defeat any opposition with one Tweet!  Will he find someone who can go toe-to-toe with him and give his career some meaning?
metadata.name: Trump Punch Man: Delete This!
